ProjectTitle: A simulation framework to probe the underlying mechanisms of impaired dynamic balance control during walking post-stroke.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
12/05/2022
For data sharing and preservation you can also consider to use KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr); fully anonymized data may be shared openly and RDR also gives the option to put access restrictions if there may still be a risk of identifying the participants.
